name: The Great Flags and Me Quiz
name_original: The Great Flags and Me Quiz
description:
We often meet people from different places of the world. These people can become our friends, they can be our workmates, roommates or schoolmates. We meet them at the companies we work for, schools, parties blah blah. But, where do they come from? You might say, "My friend comes from China or from the United States. True but can you guess the Chinese Flag Or the flag of the United States. The Great Flags and Me is a Quiz game were you name different countries basing on the countries Flag. Let's see what a genius you are. Be a Challenger.

Here is how it works: 

A flag shows up and you type in the country to which the flag belongs. If you get it right you'll get coins. These coins will with no doubt help you alot. No purchases of coins is required in this game.

Firstly, English is the supported language in this game.

Secondly, you can ask your friends for help using social media websites or apps.

Thirdly, there is no delight in owning anything unshared. For this reason we made it possible for you to share this game with everyone.

Have fun.
